title: Ok mods, this has gotten RIDICULOUS. You CANNOT keep failing THIS badly and keep your jobs.
body:
Look at this BS.

https://i.gyazo.com/ada4d2e476f5eff87212865dccb4c313.png
https://i.gyazo.com/90e838278c374ac640040994975020cb.png

You just banned me for making a fuckin joke to a friend of mine who knows its a joke. Furthermore, its OBVIOUS that since that comment was up for more than 4 hours with no issues that the report that triggered this bs Moderator action was a targeted reporting by haters abusing the report function simply because they don't like me. Haunt and I have been friends for how long now? That was a fucking joke. More over it was fuckin obvious. Get your stupid fuckin heads out of your fuckin assholes and learn to fuckin do your job.

This is just fuckin pathetic. Not one of you on the mod staff deserves anything except to be fired from gross incompetence. We CANNOT keep having these SAME issues with you fuckin morons for 2 years and keep using you. Its time Meta verse was let go, they can't do the job, they don't even know HOW to do this job, this is just a complete failure on their parts.

Overturn this bullshit 7 day ban now.

Jesus. How fuckin stupid are you mods? How stupid is it even possible to be? You folks have the intellectual prowess of a 2 year old. My 2 year old is better able to perform this job function than your entire staff combined.

 Fuckin pathetic.

15 other people have made the same joke in the last month and you let people who target report me spam reports and I get a 7 day ban for something no one has even been warned for because its always a fuckin joke

FFS HAUNT HAS IT IN HIS NAME AS A FUCKIN JOKE!!!! God DAMN yall are some stupid ass fucks.
